title: Camps Reservoir Walking Route

images.title: Chris Wimbush / Camps Reservoir Dam
images.caption: Camps Reservoir Dam. The reservoir was built in the 1930's to supply Lanarkshire.

images.title: Richard Webb / Camps Reservoir
images.caption: View of the reservoir from Yearngill Head.

images.title: Chris Wimbush / Grains by the Camps Reservoir
images.caption: Grains by the Camps Reservoir

images.title: Richard Webb / Grains Arm
images.caption: Grains Arm Grains at the head of an arm of Camps Reservoir. Seen from Ewe Hill.

description: This circular walk takes you around Camps Reservoir near Biggar in Lanarkshire. You can follow a trail around the reservoir for just under 5 miles. It's a remote and peaceful spot with lovely views over the still waters to the surrounding hills and forestry. To the east of the site there's Glenbreck Woods, Fruid Reservoir and Talla Reservoir to explore.
